p: Jeff Giddings, Promoting Justice through Clinical Legal Education (Justice Press 2013), Chapter 6; Bryan Horrigan, ‘Designing and Implementing an Enhanced Clinical Program in the Age of Disruption. Part One: The Environment for Clinic’ (2019) 26(2) International Journal of Clinical Legal Education 75; Bryan Horrigan, ‘Designing and Implementing an Enhanced Clinical Program in the Age of Disruption. Part Two: Clinical Activities’ (2020) 27(1) International Journal of Clinical Legal Education 204–230.
